name: plantflow-server
description: REST API server for PlantFlow with MQTT integration

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy plantflow-api --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --region europe-west3 --source . --entry-point plantflow --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --memory 512MB --timeout 60s --env-vars-file .env.yaml --vpc-connector plantflow-connector --egress-settings all
